article_title: 'Between Two Ferns' interview gives White House new way to reach out
article_text: - White House Press Secretary Jay Carney addressed how the president's interview on the FunnyOrDie.com Web series "Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis" helps get out his message about Obamacare during the daily briefing Tuesday. ()
